title: Riddle Of The Sphinx
features: Find the missing scroll using an archaeologists' notes and your own wits, to learn the secret that has been hidden for so long
Solve complex puzzles and find clues that will lead through secret chambers and corridors within the Sphinx
Unearth sacred artifacts as you journey through eerie labyrinths
Once you find the secret scroll, use your old friend's notes to decipher it, and uncover a 5000-year old mystery!
description: Solve the mystery of the Sphinx and undo the curse that threatens your life! / Rated E: Everyone
